10% discount of retail purchases. GNC Health Haven is a family owned and operated franchise of General Nutrition Centers. Health Haven is the oldest and ONLY locally owned franchise in Central New Mexico. We provide a wide range of GNC and other Name Brand products, personalized service, low price guarantees, delivery service, knowledgeable staff, shipping and assistance with special orders. Whether you are looking for vitamins, sports nutrition, protein bars and drinks, energy products, health and beauty or weight control solutions. Come in and see us at our 1619 San Mateo Blvd NE location here in Albuquerque.

Dance your way to health in a FUN filled hour and burn up to 600 calories. Discounted monthly pass is $30 (and no activation fee) with our auto-pay program. 25% off regular monthly membership fee of $40 and $1 off the regular single class price of $6. We offer fitness classes in Zumba, Yoga, Fitness BootCamp, Cardio KickBoxing, and Pilates. Discount available at our 6001 San Mateo, Suite D-1 location here in Albuquerque.
85% off regular Businessweek Magazine subscription pricing, follow the link below. No special code required.

perk.description: Receive 10% discount on all product orders. Beauty on a Budget! Skin care packed with multiple benefits. On trend color and application techniques; free samples so you can try before you buy; free makeovers and expert tips. Shop at your convenience with my personal delivery. No crowd, no parking hassles, no drain on your gas tank. My job is to help you be the best YOU that you can be!

Imagiframes Unique Name Art. 10% discount on all website orders. We are an Albuquerque-based business and we specialize in creating distinctive one-of-a-kind "word" art using alphabet shapes found in nature. We do it all from the photography to the framing! To receive the discount, at checkout simply type in LOBOPERKS.

10% discount when converting your tires from air to nitrogen. Making this change will increase your gas mileage 4%-10%, increase your tire life up to 50%, prevent rim corrosion, and reduce your tires rolling resistance. Not to mention that the nitrogen leaks 4X slower than air. If everyone converted to nitrogen we, as a Nation, could save 3.8 billion gallons of gas per year, which would reduce the CO2 emissions by 76 trillion lbs per year -- the equivalent of planting 7,000,000 acres of forest per year! We are a mobile service and we will deliver to your home or work place.

Receive discounts on banking services when you register an existing checking account with the Bank of America at Work program, or receive addtional incentive when you open a new account. Visit any banking center to register an existing or open a new account. Be sure to notify the banking center that you are employed at UNM and would like to be a part of the Bank of America at Work program.

20% discount on all cleaning services. These Include Carpet Steam Cleaning, Tile and Grout Steam Cleaning and Upholstery Steam Cleaning. The 20% discount also applies to Carpet repair services. These services include Carpet Re-Stretch, Patching, Transition Repair and Spot Color Matching. In the event you need Emergency Flood Services we will discount our emergency service call 50%. We work with all Insurance companies so this discount will give relief for your deductible if you need Emergency Water Extraction or Structural Drying Services. Discount available from Our World HQ located in Rio Rancho Serving the Entire Metro area.

10% discount on therapeutic/medical massage and angelic intuitive. Experience healing physically and spiritually. Release scar tissue, facilitate rehabilitation from surgery, carpal tunnel system, and whiplash. Heavenly relaxation at 40 First Plaza, SW Center for Pain Management.

Receive a 10% discount everyday; on Lobo Tuesdays, receive a free soft drink with any purchase (10% discount still applies). Free deliver for students on or around campus. Discount available from our location at 1520 Central Av SE (2 blocks west of University Blvd.

20 minute Psychic reading for $20. Initial Transformational Coaching, Arjuna REIKI session for $30. We also offer: REIKI, Heart Healings, and classes in Meditation and Self Healing. Classes and sessions in English and Spanish. Located in Nob Hill just east of Kellys at 106 Wellesley SE. Open 7 days a week, 12-8pm. Walk ins welcome. Reiki by appointment.
50% discount on inspections when selling or buying a home. Discount available from our location at 8900 Carmel NE.

Discount available from our location at 40 First Plaza, Suite 62 in Albuquerque.

Students -- a standing 50% off tickets on all performances of the Santa Fe Concert Association. Must call the SFCA office directly at 505-948-8759. Discounted tickets are offered for performances at the Lensic Performing Arts Center; St. Francis Auditorium, Cathedral Basilica, and Scottish Rite Center.

SAVE 20% on all regularly priced floral and gift items with From You Flowers. Use code 1046 when you order. As the leader in the industry on customer service standards we have confidence your order will always be perfect so we back it with a 100% product and service guarantee. 20% off online advertised rates. We offer discounts on business cards, flyers, banners, postcards, newsletters and more, so please call us for special quotes and additional details including location information. Additional volume discounts available.
